name: Swivel Stool
descr:
This durable, comfortable stool holds up to 150 kg. and offers simple pneumatic height adjustments. The height range is measured from the top of the seat with no compression. Height range: 45 - 58 cm.

Available with a single lever or 360 degree circle ring for height adjustment.

Option: Backrest and extra height from 50 - 69 cm.

Optional: extra long gas strut (order indvidually No. 29610).
